name: The Orbs
description:
WASD to move, hold SHIFT to sprint, hold LEFT MOUSE to shoot.

There is a shot cooldown every 50 shots, so you will be unable to shoot during the cooldown.

You can hide behind containers to avoid being seen by orb enemies, who will randomly wander around when they can't see you, and stop shooting at you. Sprinting while hiding behind containers will alert the orb enemies to your location.

There are 3 difficulties: EASY, NORMAL, HARD.

You cannot win in this game. Your objective is to kill as many orbs as you can before you die.

There is a "how to play.pdf" in the game folder, with instructions on how to play there. There is also a help menu in the game, where the game is explained to you with screenshots of the gameplay.

Audio is very laggy and still in development, using it is discouraged.

Made in Python3 with the Ursina game library.
